divs: Sighting Details1. Where were you and what were you doing at the time? I was a passanger in my car driving home from work. 2. What made you first notice the object? My attention was just drawn in that direction. 3. What did you think the object was when you first noticed it? I was unsure what it was. 4. Describe the object and its actions and motions. In the sky above the mountain there was a red round ball of light that was moving side to side, I witnessed this for several seconds before it shot out of sight before my wife could even look over. 5. Describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. I was mystified by what it was as it moved faster than anything I have ever seen.
trends: There have been no other sightings in East Smithfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
